alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Price; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:27PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ashland, northern Price and southeastern Sawyer Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 827 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Hawkins, or 20 miles southwest of Park Falls, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Phillips around 840 PM CDT. Fifield around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Park Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Wisconsin.
